column2: somehow empowered by Molag Bal's Harvest Heart. The vampires need to be dealt with before our forces can push forward toward the planar vortex.

column1: Harvest Time^^Side^^Ufgra gra-Gum^Cyrodiil^^^Help collect produce for the people of Cropsford.^Produce around Cropsford is not being harvested. It's going to go bad unless something's done soon.
Hatching a Plan^^Side^^Foreman Lathdar^Vvardenfell^A Melodic Mistake^^Return a town's egg mine to operations.^Another crisis looms in the Gnisis Egg Mine. Kwama workers
column2: driven mad by the tonal magicks of the Dwarven resonator
column3: killed their queen. Without the queen
column4: the colony dies. If I do not act
column5: the mining town of Gnisis will die along with it.

column1: Haunted Depths^^Dungeon^^Dhulef^High Isle^^^Explore an uncharted region of the Abecean Sea and make it back alive.^Dhulef and I crashed onto an uncharted island. The storm that wrecked us rose up from the island without warning. We have no way off without another ship.

Haunted Grounds^^Side^^Theyo Prevette at Gnisis^Vvardenfell^^^Help drive out spirits infesting a nobleman's new property.^A group of ghost hunters hired me to protect them on their current job. They've been contracted to clear out a fortress to the north that's infested with spirits. I need to keep them safe while they do whatever they do.

Haunted Legacy^^Side^^Faric Gemain^Blackwood^^^Clear the Gemain family's good name by investigating a series of old murders.^The people of Gideon believe that a woman named Cerise Gemain murdered a beloved priestess sixty years ago
column2: but her grandson
column3: Faric
column4: insists she's innocent of the charges. He enlisted me to help him prove it.

column1: Haunting of Kalari^^Side^^Kalari
column2: Ezzag or Milk Eyes^Reaper's March^^Loose Ends^Discover why there are ghosts in Kalari's house.^The rumor around town is that Kalari's new house is haunted.

column2: Dalen departed before Eldri could give him the hearts.

column1: A Healthy Choice^^Side^^Orzorga^Wrothgar^^Thicker Than Water^Help Orzorga prepare an appetizer for the King's feast.^Orzorga continues to restore the long-lost reputation of Orc cuisine. She hired me to collect additional rare ingredients throughout Wrothgar.

The Heart of a Telvanni^^Side^^Sun-in-Shadow or Arith Sendrul^Vvardenfell^^^Help Sun-in-Shadow with her fracturing relationship with Eoki.^After a harrowing experience at the hands of Magister Gothren
column2: Sun-in-Shadow finds herself at a crossroads—torn between a mage's ambition and the fruits of companionship. Dedicating herself to one may well destroy her chances at the other.

column1: A Heart of Brass^^Side^^Glurbasha inside Rkindaleft^Wrothgar^^^Find survivors of an ill-fated expedition to a Dwarven ruin.^I met Glurbasha
column2: a member of a research expedition looking into the Dwarven ruin of Rkindaleft. While exploring the ruin
column3: they were attacked by strange creatures. I told her I would look for any survivors.

column1: Heart of Evil^38^Alliance^Daggerfall Covenant^Wyress Freyda^Bangkorai^Destroying the Dark Witnesses^The Parley^Drive the hagraven and her Dark Witnesses out of Mournoth.^The only way to ensure Evermore's security and drive the Reachmen from northern Bangkorai is to defeat their leader
column2: the Hagraven Uela. I have agreed to help the Wyresses in Jackdaw Cove toward this end.

column1: The Heart of the Beast^40^Side^^Wyress Linnae^Bangkorai^^^Help the Glenmoril Wyrd recover their temple from the Reachmen.^Fallen Grotto is under the control of Brinarch and his Reachmen.

Heart of the Matter^19^Alliance^Aldmeri Dominion^Laranalda^Grahtwood^^^Recover the Heart of Anumaril.^Laranalda uncovered information proving the Heart of Anumaril is definitely located within the Reliquary of Stars. She needs my help in recovering it.

column2: Gwenaelle
column3: was lost in the chaos. He asked for my help to find her.

column1: The Heart's Desire^^Side^Neutral^Neramo^Vvardenfell^^^Recover an artifact from a scholar's bitter rival.^The scholar

column4: Artisan Lenarmen
column5: stole his Dwemer control rod
column6: and seeks to use it to find an ancient artifact. I must stop Lenarmen before he discovers the secret of Nchulefthingth.

column3: to multiple customers in Senchal. He's being somewhat cryptic

column3: demands that I disrupt their scheme.

column1: Heroes of Blackwood^^Story^^Eveli Sharp-Arrow
column2: Legionnaire Itan-Nei
column3: Captain Rian Liore^Blackwood^^^Attend the celebration thrown for you.^We stopped Vandacia and saved Blackwood from Mehrunes Dagon. Now Governor Keshu wants to throw a victory celebration in the gardens behind the governor's mansion in Gideon.

column1: The Hidden Harvest^^Story^^Chief Urgdosh^Wrothgar^^^Destroy the source of the briarheart warriors.^This Orsimer army needs to get into Frostbreak Fortress to find and destroy the source of the briarheart warriors

column3: they can't break the walls.

column1: Hidden History^^Side^^Cinosarion in Rkindaleft^Wrothgar^^^Discover what has altered the Orcs in Rkindaleft.^I met a researcher named Cinosarion. He's interested in learning what fundamentally altered the Orcs in Rkindaleft.

Hidden in Flames^11^Alliance^Daggerfall Covenant^General Mandin^Glenumbra^^The Fall of Faolchu^Cure the Camlorn citizenry of lycanthropy.^Alinon the Alchemist is working on a way to cure the unique lycanthropy that Faolchu has spread through the city. The Hidden Lord^^^^Captain Za'ji
column2: Lady Arabelle Davaux^High Isle^Guardian of Y'ffelon^The Ivy Throne^Return to High Isle and get the peace talks back on track.^Lady Arabelle hopes to finally commence the peace talks

column1: A Hidden Vault^^Story^^Captain Rian Liore
column2: Eveli Sharp-Arrow^Blackwood^^A Mysterious Event^Find out just what lies within the Daedric vault at Ojel-Bak.^Captain Rian of Leyawiin's Ivory Brigade asked me to meet Eveli Sharp-Arrow near the entrance to Leyawiin Castle. We need to run down the clue provided by the deciphered Imperial documents to find the Four Ambitions. Eveli Sharp-Arrow asked me to accompany her to Gideon as we run down the clue provided by the deciphered Imperial documents and try to find the hidden vault that contains the Four Ambitions.

A Higher Priority^^Alliance^Ebonheart Pact^Alvos Orain at Fort Virak^Stonefalls^^^Help the Pact troops at Vivec's Antlers.^A soldier at Fort Virak told me the Pact military is focusing their efforts at the land coral maze known as Vivec's Antlers.

Hircine's Gift^38^Misc^^Thoreki^The Hunting Grounds (Hircine's Gift)^^^Gain Hircine's blessing to become a werewolf.^A strange woman met me at the gates to the city. She may be a werewolf. She told me I am on my way to becoming one as well.

column3: Alchemist Rasir

column3: or other tools

column1: If the Dead Could Talk^18^Side^^Tandare^Grahtwood^^^Recover the journals of a research team from an overgrown ruin.^A research team from Elden Root has rediscovered the ancient city of Root Sunder. Unfortunately they've also been mauled by wild animals. Tandare

column2: Nahrina

column3: Raynor.
